name: Refuel (Friendly Warlocks)
description:
The Controls:

Use WASD or the ARROW KEYS to move
Use LMB or CTRL to give fuel
Use RMB or ALT to take fuel
Use MOUSE WHEEL to ZOOM IN/OUT

The Concept:

Refuel is a resource management game where the objective is to supply enough fuel for your base to send you into the next level. You must also defend your base from waves of enemies with your turret defense system. These turrets must also be supplied with fuel, which is collected from fallen enemies. Keep your turrets refueled but don't spend too much time and fuel on the towers... The horde is growing!

Joined Together:

An enemy becomes a resource in this unique and resource-driven tower defense game. Players rely on the barrage of invaders to refuel their turrets and supply power to their base. Players must literally join together with the remnants of their enemy, the turrets for refueling, and the home base to supply power.
